thag1.1:1.0.1_0: their sources go on their source
thag1.1:1.0.2_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
thag1.1:1.1_0: Like the lions of mighty fang
thag1.1:1.3_0: hear now from those who’ve practiced well
thag1.1:2.1_0: What their name, and what their clan,
thag1.1:2.2_0: and how they lived by the teaching;
thag1.1:2.3_0: how dedicated were those wise ones,
thag1.1:3.4_0: they spoke about it in these words.
thag1.1:4.1_0: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind:
thag1.1:4.2_0: so rain, sky, if you wish!
thag1.1:4.3_0: My mind is serene and freed,
thag1.1:4.4_0: I practice wholeheartedly: so rain, sky!
thag1.1:4.5_0: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Subhūti.
